text:
Yes, I'm handling a large number of contacts, and they're triggered by three known property values. The initial rush has definitely been a challenge. To manage this, I've been processing the initial data outside the workflow, which really helps us handle the volume right off the bat.
Thanks for suggesting splitting the contacts into subgroups with different delays. I'm going to give that a shot to manage the load better.
I'm also setting up a few more workflows like. Really appreciate the advice Thanks for the help!
